element.label: TIU ENTRY POINTER - CY
element.definition: This field is a pointer to the TIU DOCUMENT (#8925) file.  It stores the pointer for a cytopathology SF515 that has been electronically signed and stored in TIU.

mapping.map: TIU REFERENCE DATE/TIME - CY @TIU ENTRY POINTER - CY 63.47-1

element.label: TIU REFERENCE DATE/TIME - CY
element.definition: This is the date and time that the cytopathology SF515 was stored in TIU.  It will match the REFERENCE DATE (#1301) field of the corresponding document in the TIU DOCUMENT (#8925) file.

mapping.map: TIU REFERENCE DATE/TIME - CY @TIU REFERENCE DATE/TIME - CY 63.47-.01

element.label: DATE REPORT COMPLETED
element.definition: This is the date the report was completed.

element.label: RELEASING SITE
element.definition: This field indicates the site that released the clinical report.  This field can be used to determine the information required to correctly indicate the address/location of the laboratory responsible for  releasing the report.
